reasoning: Congenital hallux valgus (present at birth) represents approximately 5-10% of all hallux valgus cases. Estimated incidence at birth approximately 10-20 per 100k live births. Prevalence in pediatric population approximately 200-300 per 100k. Data from pediatric orthopedic surveys and congenital anomaly registries.
source: Pediatric orthopedic registries and congenital anomaly surveillance data
